definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: loop (probably from [[לולו]]; cf. [[[דוּדַי]]] p. 188 supra; Zehnpf:BAS i. 635, comp. As. lu-lu, ‘Schleife’);—only pl. abs. [[לֻֽלָאׂת]] Ex 26:5, Ex 26:5, Ex 26:5 + 8 t., cstr. [[לֻלְאׂת]] Ex 26:4, Ex 36:11; —loops on edges of curtains of tabernacle, matching the hooks ([[קְרָסִים]]), for joining the ourtains: Ex 26:4, Ex 26:5, Ex 26:5, Ex 26:5, Ex 26:10, Ex 26:10, Ex 26:11, Ex 36:11, Ex 36:12, Ex 36:12, Ex 36:12, Ex 36:17, Ex 36:17 (all P).
